STYLE.NAME: Common Cider
STYLE.NOTES: A medium, refreshing drink. Entrants MUST specify carbonation level (still petillant or sparking) and sweetness (dry, medium, sweet)
STYLE.PROFILE: Medium body. Some tannin present with moderate astringency, but little bitterness. Pale to medium gold color. Clear to brilliant.
STYLE.INGREDIENTS: Apples with some sugar adjuncts. High gravity wine, champagne or ale yeast. Often distinguished by apple variety (common, multiuse, wildings).
